name: stock-snapshot
description: Lightweight Node.js library to fetch stock financials, statistics, and overviews from StockAnalysis.com. Supports Thai and US stocks with auto-region detection
author: Dasimoa

scripts.release:patch: npm run build && npm run git-release -- patch
scripts.release:minor: npm run build && npm run git-release -- minor
scripts.release:major: npm run build && npm run git-release -- major
